entry.title: Bitcoin Knots 0.20.0.knots20200614 released
entry.summary: Bitcoin Knots has released version 0.20.0.knots20200614, which includes new features such as bug fixes and performance improvements, along with updated translations. Users are encouraged to report any bugs using the issue tracker at GitHub and to subscribe to receive security and update notifications. The full release notes and change log can be found on the GitHub page. The download link for the new version is available on the Bitcoin Knots website.
